name: Backrooms: The Hunt
description:
Backrooms: The Hunt - This is a simple online first-person shooter.
Just have fun with your friends or enemies...

  • Fresh Perspective
    This isn't your typical backrooms experience. It's a unique interpretation that sets it apart from the ordinary.
  • Casual game
    It's a very simple and casual game, play and have fun
  • Multiplayer
    Play together with other players
  • Bots
    The presence of primitive bots in the game
